episodes.title: Success Matters : Breaking Free; From Cult to Freedom & Joy with Petra Velzeboer
episodes.description:
When we don’t make decisions, life often makes them for us.

In this episode of Success Matters, Petra Velzeboer, psychotherapist, coach, and author, shares her incredible journey of leaving the Children of God cult and rebuilding her life.

Petra's story is one of resilience and self-discovery. She opens up about the challenges she faced, including depression and addiction, and how she ultimately found freedom and joy. ✨

This episode offers valuable insights into:
- The impact of cult upbringing on mental health 
- The power of education in personal growth 
- Overcoming adversity and finding your purpose 
- The importance of authenticity and vulnerability 
- Petra's definition of success - freedom and joy - is a powerful reminder to prioritize what truly matters in life. 


Listen now to hear her inspiring story and discover valuable lessons for personal and professional growth!
